DOC.brief_summary: A total 63 subject recruit three group ( 18 subject per group receive MVA BN RSV vaccine three subject per group receive placebo ) . Liquid frozen suspension MVA BN RSV . Each subject receive two vaccination either MVA-BN RSV vaccine 1 x 108 TCID50 per 0.5 ml , 1 x 107 TCID50 per 0.5 ml placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Evaluate Safety , Tolerability Immunogenicity Recombinant MVA BN® RSV Vaccine
DOC.criteria: sign date informed consent form Body mass index ≥ 18.5 < 35 . Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) must use acceptable method contraception Pregnant breastfeeding woman . Uncontrolled serious infection , i.e . respond antimicrobial therapy . History serious medical condition . History active autoimmune disease . Known suspected impairment immunologic function .
